summary: The diff implements all 6 requirements for fixing backend video finalization and persistence. Backend changes add the isPersistent flag, explicit error handling (though limited logging), and memory checks. Frontend changes add timeout detection (30s), error handling with retry buttons, and persistence verification in Home.tsx. However, some implementation details are incomplete or not fully visible due to truncation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added migration.mo module to handle data migration between old and new actor state schemas
hallucinated_features.reason: Migration functionality was not requested in the BuildRequest. The request focused on fixing finalization and persistence, not on migrating existing data structures.
The BuildRequest specified a 30-second timeout mechanism (REQ-85) but did not request a post-upload delay before triggering callbacks.
